source_objects.title: Creativity
source_objects.description: From idea generation to creative confidence, the power of the subconcious to innovation and invention, come discover methods of creativity.

items.title: Learn how to paint a bust from WWII (Intermediate Level)
items.headline: Eyes, skin, hair, camo. etc...
objectives_summary: Techniques of airbrush and paintbrush
Painting base color, lights and shadows
Painting camo. (SPLINTER)

items.title: Abstract Watercolor Fine Art
items.headline: Create a Collection Of Textured Mixed Media Paintings
objectives_summary: Abstract Painting
Watercolor Painting
Mixed Media

items.title: What is art therapy?
items.headline: An overview of the field of art therapy, education and ethical practice.
objectives_summary: Understand a brief history of Art Therapy, how art therapy works with clinical theories, properties of art materials, as well as the importance of having a Master's in Art Therapy when using it in mental health treatment.
This course will also cover the education process, credentials available, ethical use and navigating the broad field of employment opportunities available.

items.title: Elite Card Technique 2
items.headline: Intermediate Sleights And Card Magic
objectives_summary: Students will learn intermediate magic tricks and magic sleights in this course.

items.title: The Writer's Toolbox: Character Breakdown Technique

visible_instructors.title: Michael Lang
visible_instructors.job_title: Head of Story Development at Inner Image Media
visible_instructors.name: Michael

items.headline: A Technical Writing Tool to Inspire the Creative Process
objectives_summary: Create fully detailed Characters with proper motovations and emotional foundations.
Learn about Internal Conflicts and how they motivate your characters choices.
Use the tools provided to jump start a new story, edit an already completed story, and/or work through Writer's Block.

items.title: How to Develop Your Own Author Style

visible_instructors.title: Harry Dewulf
visible_instructors.name: Harry
visible_instructors.job_title: Literary Editor and Story Development Expert.

items.headline: Stop letting words use you. Master your narration and become a writing style expert.
objectives_summary: take control of your writing style and give readers a stronger, more compelling story

items.title: Playing with Time: Use Pacing to Keep Readers Wanting More
items.headline: Learn effective pacing techniques to fine-tune story rhythm while maximizing reader engagement.
objectives_summary: Identify three different kinds of time in storytelling, and the formula that cuts through the confusion of pacing.
Discover how pacing controls the reader's perception of time.
Use your understanding of the six primary fiction delivery modes to analyze pacing.

items.title: Crowdfunding for Artists: Get Funding to Create Your Artwork

visible_instructors.title: Tal Jakubowiczova
visible_instructors.job_title: Crowdfunding artist, Helps artists get money for their work
visible_instructors.name: Tal

items.headline: Funding your creative projects made possible to make your creative work come true.
objectives_summary: 33 lectures and 3 hours of video content
Know the differences in campaign types and how to choose the platform that’s right for you.
Learn how to create the different elements in your crowdfunding page: Video, Rewards, text and images.

items.title: Creating Comedic Characters & Sketch Comedy
items.headline: Joel Berry's approach to comedy
objectives_summary: Students will learn my approach to the characters I've created as well as how I find the comedy in my sketches.

items.title: Learn 4 Chords: beginner guitar lessons, start playing songs

visible_instructors.title: Rusty Perez
visible_instructors.job_title: Singer, Songwriter, speaker, and fellow traveler
visible_instructors.name: Rusty

items.headline: Begin playing guitar in one lesson: learn enough to play thousands  of songs for: worship, campfire, homeschool, kids
objectives_summary: four guitar chords which will allow you to play thousands of popular songs.
How to form 4 foundational guitar chords
How to tune the guitar

items.title: Idea Machine: How to Generate Hundreds of New Ideas
items.headline: Gain creative confidence and learn techniques from experts on how to generate TONS of new ideas in business and life.
objectives_summary: By the end of the course, you will understand the main principles of creativity
You will learn techniques from creativity experts on how to generate hundreds of ideas when solving problems
You will regain creative confidence

items.title: Anybody Can Paint - Painting Course for Beginners (Acrylics)
items.headline: Learn how to paint stunning paintings in a matter of few hours of attending this ultimate course for absolute beginners!
objectives_summary: - You will get a proper introduction to acrylic painting
- For beginners who are wanting to get started with painting, this course is ideal
- Introduction to acrylic paints and color mixing

items.title: Success Secrets of a Freelance Writer

visible_instructors.title: Rob Parnell
visible_instructors.name: Rob
visible_instructors.job_title: Freelance Writer, Educator, and Bestselling Author

items.headline: The Ultimate Guide to Becoming an Independent Author - Begin You Own New Career Within Days!
objectives_summary: Gain the skills necessary to thrive in the freelance writing world.
Feel motivated and full of self-belief in a new home based career.
Discover the many areas in which a creative writer may express him or herself for profit.

items.title: Paint like the masters -Monet
items.headline: Easy steps to creating an impressionistic painting.
objectives_summary: Paint in an impressionistic manner.
Tell others how Monet was important in the impressionistic movement.

items.title: Creative Problem Solving: Maximising Design Thinking

visible_instructors.title: Zac Curtis
visible_instructors.job_title: Capability Director at The Innovation Beehive
visible_instructors.name: Zac

items.headline: Using Design Thinking To Apply Structure To Your Innovation
objectives_summary: Build your problem solving capability with Design Thinking tools
Learn a methodology for problem solving
Download tools for creative thinking

items.title: Kids Art: Proven method for Drawing Birds + incl Art project
items.headline: Learn to draw and color birds, learn the basics of Oil pastel and watercolor techniques + create a comprehensive project
objectives_summary: Using logical method to create drawings of 6 types of birds
Understand the basics of Oil pastel coloring techniques
Design and create an all-inclusive Bird Art project
